settings.title: HANDCRAFTED IN FLORIDA
settings.text: Zap Skimboards is one of the most established and recognizable names in skimboarding, building boards for hundreds of thousands of riders all over the world since 1983. Yet with all of that success we’ve managed to stay grounded. We’re still just a small group of craftsman, artists, and dreamers who handmake every board right here in Venice, Florida.

settings.footer_newsletter_desc: Sign up for the Zap Skimboards Mailing List and be first in line for offers and updates.

settings.message_text: Labor Day Sale! Use code "LABORDAY22" for 10% off.

settings.title: THE 2022 ZAP FUSE SKIMBOARD
settings.text: All around high performance shape at the right price.

settings.title: Happy Holidays
settings.text: Sending the warmest holiday wishes and happy New Year from everyone at Zap Skimboards.

settings.title: SHRED THE CAZADOR
settings.text: The Cazador has a sharp pulled in tail that works well in larger conditions on the west coast, while still meeting all the requirements for small to mid sized waves found on the east coast and gulf coast.

settings.title: ZAP WAX
settings.text: Hand poured in the USA. Available in basecoat, cold, cool, warm, and tropical.

settings.title: the 2022 zap core skimboard
settings.text: Meet the newest addition to our lineup, the Core!

settings.title: TRICKS + TIPS
settings.desc: We have exacly the help you need right here. Getting on the board for the first time? No problem. Want to learn how to do a shuv it? We got you. The Zap Tricks + Tips video series was created for your progression.
